bool IsOMADMSessionPending ( void   ) 

Is there a pending/active OMADM session, so that an attempt to start a new data session should not be allowed.

Parameters:
none 
Returns:
true : pending OMADM session; do not start new data session false : no pending OMADM session; okay to try starting new data session
Note:
none

none

Cancel the current OMADM session.

data [in]

t [in]

  • A RIL token structure pointer

none

void requestOEMHookStringsFactoryReset ( void *  data,
size_t  count,
RIL_Token  t 
)

Initiate a Factory Reset on the attached modem.

Parameters:
data [in]

  • Pointer to the string pointer array
count [in]

  • count of the number of strings pointed to by the data array
t [in]

  • A RIL token structure pointer
Returns:
None
Note:
Support: CDMA UMTS

Assumes the string pointed to by spc argument is valid, does no internal validation of its own
